europeana:record.dc:title: The West Palaearctic species of the subfamily Paxylommatinae (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae), with special reference to the genus Hybrizon Fallén
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Achterberg, van C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Ichneumonidae
Paxylommatinae
Hybrizon
Ghilaromma
Eurypterna
keys
distribution
Palaearctic
europeana:record.dc:description: The West Palaearctic species of the subfamily Paxylommatinae are reviewed and the species of the genus Hybrizon Fallén, 1813, from the Palaearctic region are keyed. Hybrizon juncoi (Ceballos, 1957) is recognized as a valid species, a neotype is designated for Hybrizon latebricola Nees, 1834, and a lectotype is designated for Plancus apicalis Curtis, 1833. Paxylomma grandis Rudow, 1883, Ogkosoma schwarzi Haupt, 1913, and Eurypterna arakawae Matsumura, 1918, are new junior synonyms of Eurypterna cremieri (de Romand, 1838).
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: The West Palaearctic species of the subfamily Paxylommatinae (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae), with special reference to the genus Hybrizon Fallén (URN:ISSN:00240672) (Volume 73, 1-11)
